page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: I wake up at 8.30a.m. by my watch alarm and put my clothes on out of my dressing table.I wake my brother up and have breakfast which is usually cornflakes and a drink of Coca-cola. Then I watch the Saturday Picture Show on T.V. showing cartoons and the{life {styles}of different celebrities.After this programme my friend Gavin Wild and I play pass and shoot with my new football.I have corned beef and new potatoes for dinner and I then stay in the house to read a story book which I have borrowed from the public library. If I get bored or finish the book I play games on my{home computer.}I have a nice tea of fish-cake and chips,wash up with my brother Ian and go to play at the recreation park until 7p.m.When I come home I usually have cereals for my supper,watch{T.V.}and then go to bed in my own bedroom.
